item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, September 23, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. UK non-doms size up European tax breaks in hunt for fiscal advantage
2. US warns Israel against full-scale war with Hizbollah
3. ‘Battered and weakened’: Israel deals Hizbollah its worst ever week
4. HSBC hit by sixfold surge in Hong Kong property loan defaults
5. Move over copilots: meet the next generation of AI-powered assistants
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, September 23, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
